SEARCH
Package cz.ziki.had.pawn

Interface GameObject

All Known Subinterfaces:
Food
All Known Implementing Classes:
Apple, CommonFood, CommonGameObject, Lizard, Mouse, Obstacle, Snake
public interface GameObject
Interface for game objects that can be updated and drawn on the screen.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    draw(Graphics2D g2)
    Draws the game object on the screen.
    void
    setSnake(Snake snake)
    Sets the snake associated with this game object.
    void
    update(double dt)
    Updates the state of the game object.

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update(double dt)
      Updates the state of the game object.
      Parameters:
      dt - Time delta for the update.

    • draw

      void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Draws the game object on the screen.
      Parameters:
      g2 - Graphics2D object used for rendering.

    • setSnake

      void setSnake(Snake snake)
      Sets the snake associated with this game object.
      Parameters:
      snake - The snake to associate with this object.
